---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an improvement or new feature
title: "[ENHANCEMENT] "
labels: enhancement
---

## Description

A clear and concise description of what the feature should do.

## Use Case / Motivation

Why is this feature needed? (e.g., "Our app needs to track battery level more accurately for...")

## Proposed Solution

If you have a specific idea of how the API or implementation should look.

## Alternatives Considered

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.
